Reviews.Title: A lot of bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: John "Travel Guy"
Reviews.Content: Very nice HDTV for the bedroom.  I love the high definition picture from my local cable broadcasting; which is free.  This TV has a lot of good features for the price.  Picture quality for high def and regular TV are both excellent. Especially for the high def channels. Sound is good. Nice designed LCD TV package, just looks good in the bedroom.  Bought mine from Castco, and will highly recommend this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Best 20 Inch HDTV EVER
Reviews.Author: Bobbie J. Wilson-williams
Reviews.Content: this hdtv Has very great picture quality and it Show 1080p HD on my Directv Hd Reciver and not to mention the PS3 Looks Great On This Tv With HDMI and the ps3 picture quality is 1080p Full HD,Great Price For 265.I Highly Recommend.The only Thing Bad About This Tv Is The Lack Of Sound quality The Speakers Sound cheap and Has No Bass In Them But i Bought A Surround Sound And Madden 09 looks so Clear And Real and it sound like im Really There with This Tv.

Reviews.Title: Best small room LCD TV.
Reviews.Author: K. Lee
Reviews.Content: For the price the quality of this little tv is amazing.  I purchased this LCD using a gift certificate my sister gave me.  Honestly, never thought this brand of LCD was any good.  Reading reviews like this one was what finally made me push that buy button.  Last year I purchased a much larger Sony brand LCD that works well and paid over $2000.00 US for it.  The VIZIO has a built in Digital tv converter and picks up digital signals using a standard antenna the expensive sony says it does this but does not and would need a digital converter box!  Finally for around $300.00 the Vizio 720p HDTV is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Philosopher
Reviews.Content: For under $300 I have nothing but good things to say about this TV. It supports all of the video outputs that I have. Both my 360 (component) and PS3 (HDMI) games look great on it, and so does "I am Legend" on Blu-ray. The size is perfect for my room and easy to move. All in all, great TV.

Reviews.Title: Best value!
Reviews.Author: Don R. Intreglia Soto "xShadow696x"
Reviews.Content: So far this is my second one i have a 32 inch and this model and both of them are the best, they were both very well priced and are great quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: L. Fisher
Reviews.Content: I hadn't heard of Vizio before but read some reviews  and decided to purchase one.  I've had it for two weeks and love it.  The picture is good and you can't beat the price.  I'd definitely recommend this HDTV.  I had a Magnavox 15 inch HDTV before this TV and HATED IT.  After having the Magnavox for only 4 months I sold it to buy this Vizio TV.  I wish that I had bought the Vizio first.

Reviews.Title: Ideal Size for Computer Monitor & HDTV on Desk with PIP
Reviews.Author: Sir William
Reviews.Content: This Lcd HDTV for the price has great PIP which isn't advertised as much as it should because you can be watching TV while working on computer via internet.SpecificationsPanel 20" Diagonal, 16:9 Aspect RatioResolution 1366 x 768 pixelsPixel (Dot) Pitch 0.32475mm (H) x 0.32475mm (V)Display Compatibility HDTV (720P)Signal Compatibility 480i (SDTV), 480P (EDTV), 720P (HDTV), 1080i (HDTV)Colors 16.2 Million (6-bit + FRC)Brightness 450 cd/m2 (typical)Contrast 700:1 (typical)Viewing Angle >160° (horizontal), >140° (vertical)Inputs 1x Co-axial RF (ATSC/QAM/NTSC), 1x HDMI(tm)** with HDCP (plus Stereo Audio RCA forDVI source), 1x Component YPbPr plus Stereo Audio, 1x RGB PC plus Stereo Audio, 1x SVideo(AV-S) plus Stereo Audio (shared in AV-C), 1x Composite Video (AV-C)Outputs 1x Headphone Stereo JackFeatures PIP, Noise Reduction, CC, V-Chip, 3D Comb Filter, Zoom, Freeze, Motion Adaptive De-Interlace, Picture Enhancement, MPEG-2 Decoding via DTV input, NTSC Video decoding viaVideo (Composite, S-Video or Component), Progressive Scan Video via HDMI(tm)**,Component or RGB, HDTV via HDMI(tm)**, Component (Set-Top Box required), Computer640x480, 800x600, 1024x768, 1366x768 via RGB, Sound EnhancementSpeakers Built-in, 3W x 2 which sounds better connected to a surround sytem 5.1 then combo is great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV !
Reviews.Author: User Member
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the VX20L and I love it! I had never heard of Vizio before, but after some research, I decided to give it a shot. I am so glad I did. The picture is great! Nice and clear. The stereo sound is fabulous from my previous 20". This is just for a back bedroom so it is perfect. I watched Wimbledon and could clearly hear every grunt and groan of Venus Williams :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV for an awesome price!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Chen "frugalSC"
Reviews.Content: I brought this for a great price 259, as a refurbised. I've always had good expriences with refurbished items (keeping my fingers crossed and knock on wood).This is my first HDTV, and really didn't know what to expect in terms of picture quality and ease of set up as it turned out...set up was easy and the picture quality is great!!Brought it for the kitchen, and it's a perfect size. I would seriously consider getting a bigger sceen TV from this maker for the living room when I'm ready for that plunge!!!

Reviews.Title: Unreliable HDTV Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Samson
Reviews.Content: I bought this hdtv a year ago and the picture quality was mediocre compared to other hdtvs at this screen size. I took really good care of the Vizio VX20L and a year later, this thing just died on me. I tried everything to try and turn the tv on like unplugging and re-plugging all the connections and pressing the on button millions of times. What do you know? It's defective.Please do yourself a favor and go with a reputable company so that you don't have to deal with the heartache of having this sent to a TV technician or back to the warranty center.

Reviews.Title: HARES' 20" VIZIO WIDE 720P
Reviews.Author: HAROLD RISLEY
Reviews.Content: I HAVE 3 FLAT SCREENS.  2 1080P'S AND THE VIZIO 720P.  I WAS QUITE SURPRISED AT HOW GREAT THE VIZIO PERFORMS.  I NEEDED A SMALLER SET FOR MY 10 X 14 BDRM.  20 - 22" WIDESCREEN WORKS WELL.  VIZIO HAS DONE THEIR HOMEWORK.  PICTURE IS SHARP AND CLEAN WITH EXCELLENT COLOR.  REMOTE CONTROL IS EASY TO UNDERSTAND AND USE AND RESPONDS WITH LITTLE OR NO HESITATION.  WITH ECONOMY BEING WHAT IT IS, DELIVERED PRICE WAS ABOUT $25 CHEAPER THAN I COULD BUY IT ON THE STREET.  IT WAS THE BEST DEAL  FOR THIS SIZE TV I COULD FIND AT THE TIME.

Reviews.Title: good tv but sumthin is missing
Reviews.Author: DATZ DAT BONE THUG "THUGSTA#1"
Reviews.Content: after i got this tv th picture was great but once i hooked p my ps3 and try two watch dvds on it the sound was not very loud it was just okay...but the picture is great...... and perfect for the bedroom...overall its a very solid tv if its your fist hdtv and its for a small space this is great tv for you to get.... but this tv only comes in a 20"

Reviews.Title: This review will help 7th-gen gamers.
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Don't listen to any people who do NOT give this 5 stars; it's a great TV.One of my favorite things about it is that I'm picking up channels in HD!!!!!!!!!!Let's go into video games. The wii can now go into widescreen mode, and the 360, which I mailed to MS for RROD, will be able to play in possibly 1080i.I can't wait for my 360 to come back so I can play Gears, Halo 3, and Lost Planet (if you got a 360, I highly recommend these 3 games)in HD!!!! Overall, this TV is the ultimate buy.

Reviews.Title: Maybe somethings wrong with me!!
Reviews.Author: Ray Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I have read the other reviews of this product and I persoanally think it's just alright! I'll admit I haven't seen it in HD as yet but it sucks without it! The sound to me is terrible it sounds like a.....well a pc monitor which is all it is!I need sound and this models sound is lacking.

20-inch Color TFT Active Matrix LCD panel with Anti-Static and hard coated surface
High resolution 1366x 768 pixels wide screen 16:9 ratio
160 degree horizontal and 140 degree vertical viewing angles 8 ms response time
